Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Look, something is written on the wall.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Following where Liv is pointing at, you find a neatly written slogan on the wall of an abandoned building.'}
{3: '"Earth has been stricken with innumerable disasters, and time has washed every one of them away. Live for tomorrow, because all will pass."'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It looks kind of new as well. Could one of the scavengers have written this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You don't usually see scavengers being so optimistic.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'True... Which reminds me, I think I read something similar in that book from before.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You mean that "Cardman Rider Genesis" book? The handwriting does look kind of similar. It might be written by the same person.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But the words below the slogan look like they are written by someone else.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A hazily written "of course" can be seen below the slogan. There seems to be something else after these two words, but they have been roughly scrubbed off.'}
{2: 'It really is the owner of the book.', 3: '18'}
{2: "It's not every day you run into optimistic people.", 3: '21'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The young man who scrubbed off the words is showing severe symptoms of infection...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Let's just hope that he carried enough serum to treat himself...", 4: '1'}
